oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robert Weiner to Adolf Weiner
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: correspondence; Weiner, Adolph; Weiner, Robert; 1950s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: December 3, 1950 – Brother Robert Weiner (Germany) to Adolf Weiner (Memphis, TN). One sheet, with envelope. Robert updates Adolf on the family’s situation in post-war Germany. In English.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Weiner, Robert
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: two-sided, handwritten, 8 x 11.75 in., with envelope
